name: Linux kernel内存泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-02099）
product: ["Linux Linux kernel >=6.7\uff0c<6.7.11", "Linux Linux kernel >=6.8\uff0c<6.8.2", "Linux Linux kernel >=4.20\uff0c<5.4.273", "Linux Linux kernel >=5.5\uff0c<5.10.214", "Linux Linux kernel >=5.11\uff0c<5.15.153", "Linux Linux kernel >=5.16\uff0c<6.1.83", "Linux Linux kernel >=6.2\uff0c<6.6.23", "Linux Linux kernel >=3.10\uff0c<4.19.311"]
description: Linux kernel是美国Linux基金会的开源操作系统Linux所使用的内核。Linux kernel存在内存泄露漏洞，该漏洞源于gssx_dec_option_array存在内存泄漏漏洞。目前没有详细的漏洞细节提供。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://git.kernel.org/stable/c/dd292e884c649f9b1c18af0ec75ca90b390cd044
patch: Linux kernel内存泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-02099）的补丁
